zh.name: 社区品牌传播指南
zh.desc: 为开源社区或兴趣小组制定的品牌化运营和视觉传播建议。
zh.full_desc: 教你如何为你的开源项目打造独特的‘社区感’。涵盖了 Logo 设计的通用原则、社区氛围的营造方式、以及如何通过统一的视觉符号增强成员的归属感和项目的传播力。

en.name: Community Brand Guidelines
en.desc: Branding and visual communication advice for open-source communities and groups.
en.full_desc: Learn how to build a unique 'community feel' for your open-source project. Covers logo design principles, atmosphere building, and how to use unified visual symbols to enhance member belonging and project reach.
